pyzui.tilestore.tilestore module¶

Module for managing the disk-based tile storage facility.

pyzui.tilestore.tilestore.get_media_path(media_id)[source]¶

Return the path to the directory containing the tiles for the media identified by media_id.

Method :

get_media_path(media_id)

Parameters :

media_id : str

Returns:

Path to the directory containing tiles for the media

Return type:

str

Parameters:

media_id (str)

pyzui.tilestore.tilestore.get_tile_path(tile_id, mkdirp=False, prefix=None, filext=None)[source]¶

Return the path to the tile identified by tile_id.

If mkdirp is True, then any non-existent parent directories of the tile will be created.

If prefix is omitted, it will be set to the value returned by get_media_path().

If filext is omitted, it will be set to the value returned by get_metadata().

Method :

get_tile_path(tile_id, mkdirp, prefix, filext)

Parameters :

tile_id : Tuple[str, int, int, int] mkdirp : bool prefix : Optional[str] filext : Optional[str]

Returns:

Path to the tile file

Return type:

str

Parameters:

  • tile_id (Tuple[str, int, int, int])

  • mkdirp (bool)

  • prefix (str | None)

  • filext (str | None)

Note

Precondition: if filext is None, then the metadata file for the media that this tile belongs to exists and contains an entry for filext

pyzui.tilestore.tilestore.load_metadata(media_id)[source]¶

pyzui.tilestore.tilestore.tiled(media_id)[source]¶

Return True iff the media identified by media_id has been tiled i.e. iff both a metadata file and the (0,0,0) tile exist.

Method :

Parameters :

pyzui.tilestore.tilestore.cleanup_old_tiles(max_age_days=3, dry_run=False)[source]¶

Clean up tile files that haven’t been accessed in more than max_age_days.

This function removes media directories whose files haven’t been accessed (read or written) in more than the specified number of days.

Method :

cleanup_old_tiles(max_age_days, dry_run)

Parameters :

max_age_days : int dry_run : bool

Returns:

Dictionary with cleanup statistics:

  • deleted_media_count: Number of media directories deleted

  • deleted_size_mb: Total size freed in MB

  • kept_media_count: Number of media directories kept

  • errors: List of error messages

Return type:

Dict[str, Any]

Parameters:

  • max_age_days (int)

  • dry_run (bool)

pyzui.tilestore.tilestore.auto_cleanup(max_age_days=3, enable=True)[source]¶

Automatically clean up old tiles if enabled.

This function is designed to be called on startup or periodically.

Method :

auto_cleanup(max_age_days, enable)

Parameters :

max_age_days : int enable : bool

Returns:

Cleanup statistics or None if disabled

Return type:

Optional[Dict[str, Any]]

Parameters:

  • max_age_days (int)

  • enable (bool)
